summary:
Experienced manager in managing international IT & Offshoring/Outsourcing services and organizational change, both in project/program management and line management. My primary focus is on client satisfaction, result oriented en timely delivery. Structured approach, based on thorough problem defition. Experienced in projects with high risk profile, fixed date/fixed costs. 

I know how to handle in difficult situations, and how to get the team to realize the targets. Transparancy, respect and trust are key words for my way of working.

Due to my background (MSC in Management) I can set the project in a wider business context, and am able to manage a project in a financial way (investment decision / business case management).

Furthermore experienced in executing projects in an international environment.

profile_positions.description:
Execute complex / large transition & transformation projects for KPN corporate clients – most of the times I took over the project when the project was off track and client satisfaction was low.
1. NS (Dutch Railways) Connect = Key: major program for LAN standardization & WAN migration from Tele2 to KPN for all 450 NS locations, migrate 40 legacy PBX-es to Cisco HCS, migrate/phase out all PSTN/ISDN/service numbers from Tele2. This project was executed with minimal business impact and high customer satisfaction.
2) ProRail - NS Connectivity: Improve connectivity between ProRail (owner of rail infra) and NS: good and stable connections between ProRail and NS are business critical. In this program we improved the availability, implemented new connectivity between the companies and migrated application traffic to the new environment. This project is very critical for the primary business processes of NS, and was executed with minimal business impact.
3) Migration of OV9292 from old service provider & platform to a new Managed Hybrid Cloud network. This project was executed with a smooth migration & minimal business impact and to satisfaction of stakeholders.
4. UWV implementation Mobile Device Management: roll out of 14.000 new devices, migrate existing 4.500 devices to a new mobile management system and implemented additional security measurements. Client appreciates my way of working, especially high involvement, taking ownership and close alignment with client organization.
5. Enexis Connectivity: Program to implement SD LAN, SD WAN and Security services within the Enexis infrastructure, covering all 28 Enexis locations (Control Centres, HQ, training locations etc). I agreed with Enexis a realistic migration schedule when I took over the project, which was realized. 
6. Migration Superunie covering the implementation of SD-LAN, SD-WAN and Security services for approx. 1.100 supermarkets of 13 different chains.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager Transition & Onboarding

profile_positions.description: Initiate and execute a major change program in KPN Business Market / Customer Operations. Customer Operations delivers all Telco services to KPN's business clients (corporate, SME and SoHo). This change program covers supplier savings, BPR, automation and reshoring outsourced activities. My role was to identify and start-up initiatives, and then guide the project teams to realize the benefits. Result of this program is a substantial cost saving and a lean and effective organization.
profile_positions.title: Program/change manager Customer Operations

profile_positions.description: Managing and overseeing projects in the field of outsourcing and offshoring of a large part of the KPN Corporate Market organization to our Indian partner. Offshored activities include infrastructure management, workspace management, application management and data center management and commercial activities. I was responsible for offshoring approx. 350 FTE (incl 2nd generation outsourcing). I was responsible for all activities from scope definition, business case management, contracting, knowledge transfer, HR and handover to the demand organization. Furthermore responsible for contracting Master Service Agreements (IT sourcing, BPO/Finance sourcing), the development of the KPN Offshoring Methodology and the connectivity/infrastructure between KPN and our Indian partner.
profile_positions.title: Program manager Offshoring

profile_positions.description:
Implementing large international multinationals (Warner Bros, AirProducts) into KPN and partners’ service delivery organization. Solutions implemented consists of multiple services and multiple (>20) countries). My added value in those projects were the focus on result and timing (given HR aspects from client side), management of costs (fixed price projects) and my ability to work in an international setting with virtual teams (client, KPN & partners).

Implementation of new project management tool (SAP/cProjects) in business organization to enable the company to get a better grip on the execution of projects. I was asked for this project based on my knowledge of project management, way of working within KPN, financial set-up of projects and ability to translate business requirements in tool requirements.

Preparing the implementation of a new fixed & mobile telephony and data infrastructure within Ahold Netherlands (>1500 branches, 5 distribution centers, head office). Objective is to decrease the TCO of the client. Project implementation was done by a colleague, since I moved to a new position. My added value in this project was the ability to divide a very complex project (high volume, business criticality and complex/new solution) in predefined parts.
profile_positions.title: Transition manager

profile_positions.description: Focused on the implementation of improvements and standardizations within the Philips infrastructure and Getronics delivery team (e.g. centralizing service desk, implementation of a new and central service management tooling, implementing a portal etc.). This resulted in decreased costs for Philips, and increased economies of scale and higher grade of standardization for Getronics. In my Philips time I prove to build a good relation with clients, increased my legal knowledge and due to my operational experiences I was able to spot and implement opportunities for improvement.
profile_positions.title: Program manager improvement & innovation track Phlilips account

profile_positions.description: I started with the Philips account as global service delivery manager. At that time the contract was limited, but had the opportunity for grow. I focused the team to increase the service levels (by getting the team focused on quality, and structure of the team), and I have established a good relation with key stakeholders within Philips. Together with the client director and account director we were able to extend and increase the contract based on proven results, and a focus on Philips'business.
profile_positions.title: Global Service Delivery Manager Philips account

profile_positions.description: Developing and implementing an ITIL based delivery model to deliver IT services – the Global Service Delivery Model. Based on my experiences with process management, operational service management knowledge and ITIL knowledge I was asked to set up this model. With a team representing the key-countries of Getronics (approx. 10 nationalities) I defined the approach and managed the delivery of this model. This model is still the standard way of working within KPN for service management. Another part of this job was to define the functional requirements for a new global service management tool, based on the Global Service Delivery Model; and to assure the connection between product management and delivery units in the Marketing processes. During this assignment I have shown my ability to translate a theoretical model in a pragmatic way of working, build a team from persons that are globally located, have a different maturity level and were working in a virtual way together. Also I experienced in this project to work with senior management of Getronics (VP, country management).
profile_positions.title: Program Manager

profile_positions.description: Based on my experiences in IT service management I was asked to set up a new role in the Getronics Managed Services NL organization – process owner, focusing on improvement and innovations within the Dutch managed services organization (~800 FTE). I have increased efficiency (using ao Six Sigma) with about 10%, increased the standardization on processes, started the alignment between marketing and delivery for new products and initiated some new tooling.
profile_positions.title: Process owner

profile_positions.description:
In this role I was managing the IT service management team for one of the largest accounts of Getronics NL. I have structured the way of working and decreased the team with 20%, without affecting neither service levels nor client satisfaction. During this job I gained a lot experiences in hands-on IT support, as well as people management.

Ad-interim responsible for transition LAN management for the city of The Hague/Haagnet.
profile_positions.title: Field manager

profile_positions.description:
For a migration project for one of the key accountsI acted as project lead to execute the end-user training/communication and the training of/handover to the delivery organization. I proved to translate the new way of working from a technical point of view to the end-users and to build a bridge between the project team and the delivery organization, resulting in a smooth hand-over.
	
For a migration project for the Ministry of Social Security I have executed the PMO role for the project manager. I have set up the project schedule, implemented the project team standards (templates, project SharePoint, rules of engagements etc), set up the roll-out schedule and managed the financials around the project. I have shown my scheduling capabilities, as well as the structured way of setting up the financials around such a complex project. 

I coordinated the transition of IT support functions from various local support units to Getronics for the APAC region of DSM (13 countries, approx. 2.500 affected DSM end-users). During this project I’ve gained experiences in the management international and virtual teams, as well as IT support. I showed my capabilities in delivering project results in-time and in-budget (fixed time / fixed date) and the development of a transition methodology.

For several parts of Fortis Bank I have executed a project to adapt all printed-material to the Euro-introduction. This includes the investigations of material to be adapted (flyers, bank statements …), the development and delivery of new materials (including agreements on the boundary values. During this project I showed my capabilities of thoroughness, negotiating/decision taking and focus on time.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description: Setting up my own consultancy firm in the area of market research, I got several projects which I have executed by my own or by ‘hiring’ classmates. This taught me how to do the commercials in project, how to build relationships with clients and how to manage the responsibilities of deliver what has been agreed.
